name: It has to be silent in mountains!
name_original: It has to be silent in mountains!
description:
A little yeti is sleeping sweetly in his house... but NO! Someone disturbs him! Fight snowballs and little avalanches in order to punish these noisy people. 

Controls: A, S, D and J, K, L

Any feedback is warmly welcome!

Game by MAD LAB team:

Alexander Gavrilushkin, Ivan Dolgikh - programming

Andrey Bezrukov - music

Mariya Kshnyakina - art & intro music
